metadata.Title: CVE-2020-10705 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was discovered in Undertow in versions before Undertow 2.1.1.Finalwhere certain requests to the "Expect: 100-continue" header may cause anout of memory error. This flaw may potentially lead to a denial of service.

criterions.comment: undertow: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
